name: MyDecider
0:
”Alexa, ask My Decider if I should sleep in today”
”Should we visit the beach tomorrow”
”Decide if it makes sense to go for a run”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my decider
des:
Ask My Decider if you should take some action, and it will choose at random for you.

We all have tons of small decisions to make daily, which add up and steal our energy and attention. Save your decision-making energy for the big choices, and let My Decider handle the small (or wacky) stuff!

Because sometimes, the choosing itself is more important than the choice you make...
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
